attributes.action: Ban production and sale of lab grown meat.
attributes.additional_details: As yet it is unknown what the long term health effects are of eating lab grown meat. It is inevitably detrimental to farming industry. It is unnecessary, expensive and as yet not known to be sustainable on a large scale.
attributes.background: Ban the production and sale of lab grown meat and products containing lab grown meat.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Ban lab grown meat for pet food, and do not approve it for human consumption
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/717302
